name: Kaboom Swing
description:
Kaboom Swing: Help a little bomb to catch the flag in this explosive golf course! Roll, explode, avoid spikes and destroy everything!
This game was made in 10 days for the gotm.io jam with the theme "Destroy everything".
It is also my first game made with Godot, so please be kind. :)

 Follow me on twitter if you like my game @hav24  

Controls

- WASD or Arrow keys to roll.
- Long press SPACEBAR button in order to explode and jump.
- "R" to reset.

Credits

All assets were made by me,  Alessandro Pezzetti aka havana24
8bit sound effects made with Bfxr and Freesound.
Background music by Playonloop.com
Pixel font by Kenney.
Also special thanks to Karbb and Davcri. 

A game made by havana24.net Twitter @hav24
